name: Birkenstock Mayari Leather Sandals - Women's
description: Don’t like rigid posts between your toes? Give these supportive sandals with soft toe loops a try. Pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier. Flexible shock-absorbing base, arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step, because sunset dance parties never go out of style.Smooth and durable leather uppers.2 adjustable straps with buckles.Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management.Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet.Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing.Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps.EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks.
